```{r}
ggplot(data = pie_crab, 
       aes(x = latitude,  
           y = size)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Crab Graph",
       subtitle = "a beautiful story",
       caption = "Here is our crab graph. Take a look for yourself.")
```
